attributes.title: Aakashic Readings on Kaala - How to Control Time!
attributes.description:
Satsang Delivered on 25th October 2019

Essence: 

ALL THESE TRUTH ARE INDEPENDENTLY POWERFUL AND CAPABLE TO MAKE YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS INTO SUPERCONSCIOUSNESS. YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS IS THE SEED. THE SEED IS WAITING TO FLOWER, TO ACHIEVE ITS COMPLETION AND FULFILLMENT. SO LISTENING AND COGNISING THESE TRUTHS WILL ACHIEVE COMPLETION, FULFILLMENT AND ENLIGHTENMENT. THE FIRST TRUTH: 
KAALA CONTINUOUSLY MEETS YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS NOW. 
 IF YOU KEEP YOUR NOW IN INCOMPLETION OR HOPE, IT WILL CONTINUE FOREVER. IF YOU KEEP YOUR NOW IN COMPLETION OR CLARITY, THAT WILL MANIFEST FOREVER. KAALA DOES NOT MEET YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS IN THE PAST OR IN THE FUTURE. HE MEETS YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS NOW IN THE PRESENT. DURING YOUR PRESENT MOMENT, BE IN THE SPACE OF COMPLETION.DO NOT HAVE GUILT OR WORRY. THE OFFICIAL ATTITUDE TOWARDS INCOMPLETION, TOWARDS GUILT AND FEAR IS UNCLUTCHING! EVERY TIME YOU SHARE LOVE, EVERY TIME YOU USE LOVE AS YOUR STRATEGY FOR YOUR EXISTENCE, THE JOY THAT OOZES OUT IN YOUR BEING IS THE STRENGTH OF KALABHAIRAVA. KALABHAIRAVA IS ETERNALLY LOVING, CARING, BLISSFUL, FEROCIOUS, ECSTATIC. MEDITATE ON HIM! LISTEN TO THIS DEVA RAHASYA. LOOK AT EVERYTHING YOU SEE WITH LOVE. HUG EVERYTHING YOU SEE INCLUDING THE AIR.DONâ€™T NEED TO WAIT FOR INCOMPLETIONS, POWERLESSNESS, FEAR TO DISSOLVE, TO GET COMPLETE TO MANIFEST PARAMASHIVA. 

KALABHAIRAVA WILL MANIFEST THREE POWERS IN ALL OF YOU THROUGH THIS PROCESS. 

1. INTENSE LEVITATION. 
2. LARGE QUANTITY OF MATERIALIZATION OF THE OBJECTS YOU NEED AS PRASADA. 
3. DIRECTLY THE POWER TO STOP TIME AND PLAY WITH TIME!
